name: Pivot Point Support Resistance Analysis
question: Which stocks are reacting at key pivot point support and resistance levels?
retailQuestion: Which stocks are bouncing off important price levels?
description: Analyzes classical pivot points, support (S1, S2, S3) and resistance (R1, R2, R3) levels to identify intraday and swing trading opportunities. Examines price reactions at pivot levels, volume confirmation, and breakthrough probability for tactical entry and exit points.

workflow.description: Step 1: Get active stocks for pivot point analysis
Step 2: Get historical price data for pivot point calculation and level identification
Step 3: Get current market data for real-time pivot level interaction assessment
Step 4: Calculate pivot points and analyze price reactions at support/resistance levels
Step 5: Rank pivot interactions by reaction strength and breakthrough probability
